# limmi Package: 
The goal of `limmi` is to provide functions for running [LIMMA](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/limma.html) against medical images.

## Installation

You can install `limmi` from GitHub with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("muschellij2/limmi")
```
